name: Notion Finance OS
description: Finance OS is an all in one system built in Notion that lets you easily manage and keep track of your finances. What you get:✓ Expense tracking ✓ Income tracking ✓ Subscription tracking✓ Monthly Budgeting✓ Monthly Reports ✓ Wish List Tracking ✓ Debt Tracking ✓ Add multiple accounts ✓ Account fund transfers ✓ All-in-one dashboard ✓ Tutorials & documentation ✓ Lifetime access ✓ Updates includedManage all your Accounts from one placeYou can add as many accounts as you have.Manage your Finances
